Key: (Mm. I sure feel refreshed.)
(It's nice and sunny today, too.)
Heeeeey, Onii-cha...
Wait, huh? You're awake!
Hey, Kotori. Morning. You're early.

Good morning, Onii-chan. I thought I'd
wake you up, since it's been a while.

Too bad. More importantly, Kotori, you
seem pretty cheery this morning.

Because today's the day we're playing
with everyone, right?

(That's right. We're supposed to meet with
the group at the amusement park. That's
why I got up so early.)

You seem ready to go, Kotori. Now that I
remember, Maria's not here.
She's already downstairs!

Oh, I see. I guess she's looking forward to it
too.

(Well, I'm sure she's never gone to an
amusement park before. It's natural for
her to be excited.)

Onii-chan, are you possibly sad that Arusu
didn't sleep with you here? You pervert～!
Of course not!

(It's true that not seeing her here was
kind of odd...)
Whaaaat? Are you suuuure?

Of course I'm sure! Forget it. Let's eat
breakfast and head out.
Okaaaay!
Good morning, Shido.
Morning, Maria. You got up early today.

We are going on a day trip after all. The
breakfast preparations are finished, so
please feel free to eat.
Right. Thank you. I'll have some right away.

I also prepared a bento for everyone. When
the time comes, let us eat them there.

Ohh. So you made bento for us too. You
sure are prepared.

(Her expression doesn't say as much, but
could it be... that Maria's actually excited
about today?)

Hey, Maria. You know what to expect at an
amusement park, don't you?

Yes. I have an understanding of what we will
see. However, it will be my first time visiting
one.

Huh, figures. Then let's make the most of our
day. Today, the people going are me, Maria,
Kotori...

Onii-chan, don't forget, okay～? Origami-san,
Yoshino, and Yuzuru are coming too!
I see. So Kotori, going with white today?
Hmmm? Whatcha talking about?
Um, never mind.

(I wonder if that means she's planning to
have as much as fun as possible at the park.
Being on-call as Commander wouldn't help.)
Everyone else should be arriving soon, right?

Yes. Let us wait outside. That way, meeting
up will not be an issue.
All right. That's a good idea.
Yes.

Maria, once we make it to the amusement park,
do you have any rides you want to hit first?

I have some potential candidates, but I could
not select one. To be frank, I wish to see all of
them.

I see. All of them... Wait, all of them?! It's a
holiday. I mean, it won't be an issue, since
we're in a game world after all.

I understand that many people flock to
amusement parks, making them crowded.
If I do something about it, will we have fun?

Ah, that's right. One of the charms about
attending an amusement park is waiting
in line, though.

Very well. Then, it would be okay to set the
conditions to default, yes?

Yeah. While you're lining up, your adrenaline
hits from the waiting. It's fun to talk to your
friends in line too.
Yes. I look forward to it.

(Yeah. All that matters to me is that Maria
enjoys herself to the fullest.)
Um, good morning...
Hiya! Did we keep ya waiting?
Yoshino, morning. And you too, Yoshinon.
Yoshino was so excited yesterday that she\ncouldn't sleep, could ya?
Oogh... Um, um...

Gotcha. I'm pretty excited too. Let's all have
a wonderful time.
Yes... I'll do my best.
Yeah! We'll give it our all, Yoshino. Who\nknows what surprises are in store.

(That sounds kinda like an evil scheme,
but oh well...)

By the way, are Yuzuru and Origami together?
I guess I don't see why they would be.
Oh, Yuzuru-san is, um... still not...
Yuzuru-chan, you see, was so regretful\nabout leaving Kaguya that she took too\nlong, so we left her behind.
Ahh. The usual.
Which means the only one not here is Yuzuru.
Whoa. Good morning, Origami.
Good morning, Shido.

Good morning, Origami Tobiichi. Let us
get along today.
Yes, let's.
Oh, Origami. Perfect timing. Mind if we chat?
What is it, Shido?
Ah, well... I wanted to ask a little favor.
Understood.
Huh?! You haven't even heard it yet!

Today, you intend on prioritizing Maria
Arusu's enjoyment. You wish for me to
assist you. Am I incorrect?
Oogh. You read me like a book...

I am your *girlfriend*, Shido, so this insight
should not be unexpected.

(She said girlfriend so emphatically. Man.
Now I feel guilty, like I'm being pressured
by her aura.)
Well, that's how it is, so please help me out.

Leave it to me. I know the best way to
optimize stimulation at an amusement
park. In practical terms, it will be simple.
Hearing that assures me... I think.
There's no problem.
Apology. Please pardon my tardiness.
Oh. You made it, Yuzuru.

Regret. It was my intention to bring Kaguya
too, but she insisted it was unfair to have two
days with you when I was home yesterday.

Haha. How very like Kaguya to be so logical.
All right, let's head in.
Yeah～! Full steam ahead!
Yes. We are ready.
Yuzuru, a moment of your time?
Question. What is it, Shido?

Maria... doesn't have much experience going
out with everyone like today. I was wondering
if you could make an effort to bond with her.

Understanding. However your concern is
unnecessary.
Unnecessary?

Affirmation. Without having to put forth
too much effort, I and the others will easily
make Arusu comfortable.
I... hope so.

Amusement. You are overprotective, Shido.
It's okay. Leave it to us.
If you say so. I trust you.

Agreement. How much enjoyment can one derive
from an amusement park? Kaguya and I once made
a contest of it. I was the winner. Fret not.

When you say that, it worries me... Wait,
it's not that difficult to enjoy an amusement
park. Oh well. I'll trust your judgment, okay?

Assertion. I have an interest in befriending
Arusu too. Look, Yoshino is doing her
best as well.
M-Maria-san. Let's... go together. And... chat.
Yes, Yoshino. I wish to chat as well.

Haha. Chat as much as you'd like. We have
plenty of time. Okay, let's enter the park.
